channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Michigan voters to choose party candidates for crucial Senate race in battleground state
item.description: National attention has turned to Michigan for the presidential race, but voters will also have a major say in determining which major party controls Congress next year.

item.title: Trump and Vance return to Georgia days after a Harris event in the same arena
item.description: Former President Donald Trump is returning to Georgia to campaign in a state that both Democrats and Republicans see as up for grabs yet again.

item.title: Parties in lawsuits seeking damages for Maui fires reach $4B global settlement, court filings say
item.description: A court filing says the parties in lawsuits seeking damages for last yearâ€™s Maui wildfires have reached a $4 billion global settlement.
